name: The Trial of Dragon Mountain
description:
A simple game I made during my spare time over the course of a month or so.

Use the Up and Down arrows to move, hit the Spacebar to shoot, and hit the ESC key to pause the game.

Art, Music, and Programmed by: Caden Marofke
You can reach me at c.marofke@gmail.com
Kornik font by: zai.tomasz.skowronski@gmail.com

Browse the code: https://github.com/dinosire/TrialOfDragonMountain

Have any questions or comments? Spot any bugs? Have any awesome ideas for new features? Leave a comment below!
